item.title: Practice Questions and Written Responses
item.description: Pactice 1 Do you aggree or disagree with the following statement? Decisions made by a group are always better than decisions made by individuals. I agree with the statement that group decisions are bettwr.

item.title: Recitation of Model Essay
item.description: Preference 1 Some people perfer to travel with their family. Some people perfer to travel alone. Which do you prefer? I perfer to travel alone. For one thing, the schedule for the trip will be more flexible.
